recordUpdates.name: Update_Op_Id_to_my_Order
recordUpdates.label: Update Op Id to my Order

fields.name: Alldone
fields.fieldText:
Great Job Fam!

You filled that form out like a pro. We knew you could do it. ;)



Whats next?

A member of our team will review your project and reach out to you on a weekday within 24 hours.


Add another order

Have another order to add? Lets get that one started too!


Have more questions for us? Give us a call (800) 865-0726!

Oops, Looks like something went wrong. Please refresh this page and try again.


If problem persists, please reach out to us at (800) 865-0762.

fields.fieldText: That is a pretty quick turnaround! Your Project Advisor will be in touch on how best to serve you and your needs. Feel free to chat with us in the bottom right of your screen as well!

textTemplates.name: clientConfirmEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Hey {!Get_Contact.FirstName},


We got it!


Were reviewing your project {!project_name} right now to make sure weve got all the details. Well be reaching out to you shortly with an update!


Love ya Fam!,

{!Get_Contact.Contact_Owner_For_Flow_Emails__c}

textTemplates.name: PA_Email_Body
textTemplates.text:
{!Get_Contact.Name} has requested a quote!

Client Email: {!Get_Contact.Email}

Opportunity: CLICK HERE


Details from Client:

{!vaAllQuoteInfo_Email}
